title: 1966–67 Cypriot Second Division
text:
The 1966–67 Cypriot Second Division was the 12th season of the Cypriot second-level <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league. <a href="ASIL%20Lysi">ASIL Lysi</a> won their 1st title.
Format.
Twelve teams participated in the 1966–67 Cypriot Second Division. The league was split to two geographical groups, depending from <a href="Districts%20of%20Cyprus">Districts of Cyprus</a> each participated team came from. All teams of a group played against each other twice, once at their home and once away. The team with the most points at the end of the season crowned group champions. The winners of each group were playing against each other in the final phase of the competition and the winner were the champions of the Second Division. The champion was promoted to <a href="1967%E2%80%9368%20Cypriot%20First%20Division">1967–68 Cypriot First Division</a>.
Changes from previous season.
Teams promoted to <a href="1966%E2%80%9367%20Cypriot%20First%20Division">1966–67 Cypriot First Division</a>
New members of <a href="Cyprus%20Football%20Association">CFA</a>
Furthermore, <a href="PAEEK">PAEK</a> returns to the league after 2 periods.
Champions Playoffs.
<a href="ASIL%20Lysi">ASIL Lysi</a> were the champions of the Second Division. ASIL Lysi promoted to <a href="1967%E2%80%9368%20Cypriot%20First%20Division">1967–68 Cypriot First Division</a>.
